TopicTitle: How do I upload a crash log?

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone,

I'm totally new to the forums, and I'm having issues. How do I post a crash log to have someone look at it? My 0.19.1 keeps crashing and I'm not sure why.

Help appreciated!

Thanks!

This should help answer your questions.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24543-NEED-SUPPORT-Read-this-before-posting?highlight=upload+crash
